titleStmt.title: Englands Helicon. Or The Muses harmony
titleStmt.author: Bodenham, John, fl. 1600.
Moore, Richard, fl. 1607-1631.
N. L. (Nicholas Ling), fl. 1580-1607.
A. B., fl. 1600.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Snodham] for Richard More, and are to be sould at his shop in S. Dunstanes Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: One of a series sponsored by John Bodenham, to whom the editorship is usually attributed; also sometimes attributed to Nicholas Ling and to A.B.
This edition enlarged and edited by Richard More, who signs the dedication.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
